interface.name: AudioClip
interface.javadoc: The AudioClip interface is a simple abstraction for playing a sound clip. Multiple AudioClip items can be playing at the same time, and the resulting sound is mixed together to produce a composite. Arthur van Hoff JDK1.0
Starts playing this audio clip. Each time this method is called, the clip is restarted from the beginning.
Starts playing this audio clip in a loop.
